p:
The antileishmanial activity of MD-EO and CS-EO may be associated with the presence of E-caryophyllene, as previously suggested in the literature for other essential oils in which E-caryophyllene was one of the main components
15, 29, 34, 35 . E-caryophyllene could also interact with other minor components of MD-EO and CS-EO in a synergistic way.
